documents.document: Maybe I hope too much. Maybe I dream too much. But at least I won't give up until I've tried, and I won't regret anything.
I want him to text me first just to prove I was on his mind.
I never regretted telling you I liked you. The only regret I have is never hearing what you really thought of me.
Haters don't really hate you, they just envy you and hate themselves because you're a reflection of what they cannot.
I'll wait for you, until I have no reason to wait anymore.
There's a story behind every person, a reason why they are the way they are. So think about that before you judge someone.
Letting go is having the courage to accept change and having the strength to keep moving.
Every girl needs a good guy who can help her laugh when she thinks she'll never smile again.
I pray not because I need something, but because I'm ought to thank God about something.
To love someone is to understand each other, to laugh together, to smile with your heart, and to trust one another.
A real relationship: has fights, trust, faith, tears, pain, argument, patience, secrets, jealousy, and LOVE.
I wonder why peoples smile when they heart actually cry? Doesn't it make you feel more sad?
G: So is it gonna be me or her? B: If you love me, you wouldn't make me choose. G: If you love me, there wouldn't even be an option.
Every girl wants a boy who will love her from depth of his heart and protect her from everyone.
Thank you God for blessing me much more than I deserve.
Don't ever be afraid to show who you really are, because as long as you are happy with yourself, no one else's opinion matters.
Jatuh cinta itu memang di luar kontrol kita. Tapi berkomitmen untuk tetap saling mencintai ada di dalam kontrol kita.
A woman's smile can also mean pain. Sometimes a smile is just a mask while she tries to remain strong.
There comes a time when you have to choose between turning the page or just closing the book.
You can never teach a guy to love you the way you want to be loved. You have to wait for him to do it his own way at his own time.
Be close to that person who makes you happy, but be closer to that person who can't be happy without you.
God is ALWAYS doing a work in your life. Sometimes He may be behind the scenes, and you may not feel it right away, but He is there.
Every girl has that guy she will never stop loving and every guy has that one girl he will never stop fighting for.
He's the guy who makes me believe that true love can be found.
True love is when someone accepts your past, supports your presents, and encourages your future.
My heart is perfect because you're inside it.
That moment when you are really sleepy but you don't want to go to sleep because you are talking to that special someone.
I don't know what my future holds, but I'm hoping you're in it.
There are times when I'd stare at the sky at night and wonder why you are my entire universe when I'm not even a little star in yours.
I don't know why we fight or argue. It doesn't make me love you less, but it does make me realize how much I truly love you.
You can't predict when love will arrive. Only GOD knows. The only thing you can do is wait, be patient, and trust Him.
Go for someone who is not only proud to have you, but will also take every risk just to be with you.
I like you more than you can imagine.
No matter what standards we set for our lover, the fact will always remain that the person we fall in love with will always be an exception.
A girl is happiest when she knows you make her your everything in front of everyone, every time.
If you love someone, be brave enough to tell them, otherwise, be brave enough to watch them be loved by someone else.
When you least expect it, love will come to you. The universe will present someone for you.
By chance we met and by choice we loved.
One thing I don't understand about life. We meet thousands of people, then we will meet that one person and our life will change forever.
Sometimes I don't tell you what I'm feeling, because I'm hoping the silence between us would give you a clue.
I wonder if you notice just how much you brighten up my days.
I can't make you love me, want me, or understand me. All I can do is hope that someday you will.
When you're sad you must smile; When you're happy you must laugh; When you're weak you must stay strong!
Ketika kamu berhenti mengejar apa yang bukan untukmu, maka Tuhan akan mempertemukan kamu dengan apa yang baik untukmu.
Always forgive and love yourself, have the courage to live your life the way you wish, and never be afraid to speak the truth.
I never ever thought I'd like you this much and I never planned to have you on my mind this often.
You may never understand why God does things that cause you heartache, but you can be sure that God is not making any mistakes.
Sometimes you just have to give up, not to get nothing, but to get something more worthy.
There comes a point in your life when God brings someone in, at a very unexpected time, b/c He wants to show u that u deserve a honest love.
When your day is hard, a simple saying like "Thank you, God" will simply make things feel lighter.
You idiot... How many times I have to drop a hint until you realize I like you...
Hope is some extraordinary spiritual grace that God gives us to control our fears.
Saying good morning and good night is not just a simple greetings, but it's a way of expressing love.
Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realise they were the big things.
No one realized just how much I loved you until you left me and they saw the silent tears coming from my heart.
God holds my today and tomorrow in the palm of His hands. I know I am secure no matter what comes against me.
When he smiles, I melt deep inside.
It hurts when I want to express what I feel, but all I can do is stay quiet.
You're the reason I smile. You're also the reason why I haven't been smiling much recently.
Love can't always be measured by how long you wait. It's about how will you understand why you are waiting.
Maybe this isn't our time yet. I let fate decide. If we were meant to be, we'll be together. Maybe not now. Maybe not yet.
The best thing in life is finding someone who knows all your mistakes and weaknesses and still thinks you're completely amazing.
Relationship's like an onion which has many layers of TRUST and CARE. If you try to cut it, you will find nothing except tears in your eyes.
Sometimes, you need to be alone, not to being lonely, but to enjoy your free time being you and yourself.
I want to be the girl who makes your bad days better. The girl that makes you say, 'My life has changed since I met her.'
Distance means so little when someone means so much.
What most people need to learn in life is how to love people and use things instead of using people and loving things.
When you really care about someone, their happiness matters more than yours.
If you are unsure about your future just keep doing what you know is right. What is meant to be will find you. God will make sure of it.
The first person who comes to your mind once you wake up in the morning is usually the one you love the most.
If I could see my life as a puzzle, I would realize that you are the piece that is missing.
Don't let the troubles of life push u down. Know that everything has a season and soon the blessings from God will rain on you.
Relationships will always have fights, but having fights shows how much you guys care about each other.
I don't care about your past. I want to know if there is a place for me in your future.
When you really love someone, you will always "Make Time" for them. No matter what, no matter how, you will work it out.
One day you will meet someone who doesn't care about your past, because they just want to be with you in your future.
There are so many people out there who will tell you that you can't, but all you have to do is turn around and say, "Watch me!"
Heart, hides what we can't say. But eyes, say what we try to hide.
Life is like a rainbow. You need both the sun and the rain to make its colors appear.
I don't want someone to tell me how much they care and love about me, I want someone to prove things they say to me.
If we blame God for every tear, why don't we thank Him for every smile.
Happiness is a choice. Your circumstance can affect it, but you're still the one who decides your happiness.
Strength isn't about how much you can handle before you break, it's about how much you can handle after you break.
My concern is not whether God is on our side. My greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.
When I called you at 2 am because I'm scared and couldn't sleep, but you stayed up with me till I can, that's when I know I love you.
How can I expect you to understand me, when truth is, I don't even understand myself.
Love is something which can't be expressed in words, but can be felt by anyone in the universe.
A smile is a language of agreement. A smile is a language of peace. A smile is a language of good looks. A smile is a good weapon.
All I need is for you to cheer me up when I'm down, love me when I feel alone and be there when I need you.
Every tear has it's own meaning, just like every smile has it's own pretending.
When I see a shooting star, I only have one wish, and that's to forget you.
Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
If God knows we're meant to be together, He'll find a way to bring us closer no matter how far apart we are.
Some things can only be expressed in music, just as how we cannot explain the smell of a rose.
If you really do love him, then fight for him, don't just stand back and watch him fall for her instead.
You know he's something special when no matter what kind of mood you're in, he can always manage to make you smile.
My heart is looking forward for tomorrow, but my mind knows that it won't be like I wish..
You are not always going to make great decisions, but God sees your heart and will bless you anyway.
As long as we can see the same sky, breathe the same air, step on the same planet, then you and I are not impossible.
Everyone says there are many other guys out there beside him. There's one problem: none of them can make me feel the way he does.
